description: A production-ready tool for converting Ansible playbooks to use Fully Qualified Collection Names (FQCNs) with robust error handling, configurable mappings, and comprehensive validation.
rules: Use comprehensive docstrings with type hints for all public methods
Follow Google-style docstring format with Args, Returns, and Raises sections
Include practical usage examples in docstrings
Use dataclasses for structured return values
Implement proper error handling with custom exception hierarchy
Support both CLI and programmatic usage patterns
Provide configurable mappings and validation options
Use Context7 MCP for up-to-date documentation generation
